vote.text: Amendment SA 1201 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1201 proposed by Senator Corker for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 1200. (consideration: CR S2657; text: CR S2657) To amend the preamble.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1201 proposed by Senator Corker for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 1200.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1201 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
